title: How do I know that Present Perfect is suitable for me?
description:
Present Perfect is great for people who experience persistent anxiety that affects all areas of their life, preventing them from achieving goals and reaching their full potential. 

[break]

Remember, that Present Perfect is not a magic pill that will solve all problems, but it will give you a desire to solve them on your own. Not suitable for children and adolescents under 18 years, pregnant or breastfeeding women.

title: Is there a maximum Present Perfect dosage?
description: Yes, Duradry is formulated with ingredients that are gentle on your skin. It has been dermatologically tested to ensure it does not cause irritation. However, if you have sensitive skin, it's always a good idea to do a patch test before using it on a larger area.
